comments:
I wanted to switch from the Java Perspective to the Synchronize Perspective and
got an error that the view could not be instantiated. This is from the logs. It
seems that the classloader is somehow messed up. The only thing I did up to that
was start an Ant task that starts up Tomcat in a new VM, then perform a global
search and replace in some ASP files.
